缿字的基本解释

缿
xiàng
古代储钱或接受告密信件的器具。口小，可入而不可出，用瓦或竹制成。

缿字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xiàng］
［《廣韻》胡講切，上講，匣。］
“后2”的被通假字。亦作“銗2”。
(1)古代的储钱器。
(2)古代官府接受告密文书的器具，入口小，易入难出。
(3)竹筒。

缿字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【缶字部】　缿； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页945第25
【廣韻】胡講切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】戸講切，?音項。【說文】受錢器也。古以瓦，今以竹。　又【集韻】徒口切，音?。義同。　又【集韻】下遘切，音候。【玉篇】如瓨，可受板書筩，令密事。【前漢·趙廣漢傳】又敎吏爲缿筩。【註】師古曰：若今盛錢臧瓶，爲小孔，可入而不可出。

缿字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
缿字的起名意思

暂无。

缿
Basic explanation of words
缿
xiàng
An ancient device for saving money or receiving informant letters. The mouth is small, can be in but not out, made of tile or bamboo.
缿
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xiàng］
["Guang Yun" Hu talks about cutting, talking on the top, box. ]
"Post 2" was passed falsely. Also known as "銗2".
(1) Ancient money storage device.
(2) The equipment used by the ancient government to accept whistleblower documents has a small entrance and is easy to enter and difficult to exit.
(3) Bamboo tube.
缿
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not concentrated] [Fou Character Department] 　缿; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 945 No. 25
[Guang Yun] Hu Jiangqi [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun] Do not talk and cut,? Sound item. [Said the text] The money receiver is also. In ancient times, we used tiles and now we use bamboo.　[Jiyun] again, utterly cut, sound?. The same meaning.　[Jiyun] Next cut, sound waiting. [Jade articles] Such as 瓨, can be written on the blackboard 筩, make secret matters. [Previous Han·Zhao Guanghan Biography] Again, he was 缿筩. [Note] Shigu said: If the Qian Zang Ping today is a small hole, it can be entered but not out.
